AnalyticsWorkspaceId.description: The ID of the Tableau Next workspace the dashboard is associated with.

DeveloperName.description: The API name of the dashboard.

Language.description: The supported languages for the visualization. There are over 50+ supported language and dialect values.

LastDraftModifiedDate.description: The last modified date for the dashboard in draft mode.

LastPublishedDate.description: The last published date for the dashboard.

NamespacePrefix.description: The namespace prefix for the dashboard.

OwnerId.description: The user ID of the user who created the dashboard.

Style.description: The widget style for the dashboard, represented as a JSON string. For example, {"widgetStyle":{"backgroundColor":"#ffffff","borderEdges":[],"borderColor":"#cccccc","borderWidth":1,"borderRadius":0}}

TemplateAssetSourceName.description: If the dashboard was created from a template, this is name of the asset source.

TemplateSource.description: If the dashboard was created from a template, this is name of the template.

Version.description: The API version for the dashboard.
